internship.title: Internship Program
internship.description: Join internship programs to deeply understand the technology and philosophy of Bitcoin while gaining hands-on experience through real projects. Learn Bitcoin development through lectures and mentoring, and experience contributing directly to the Bitcoin ecosystem through practical work.
